settings.text: Take our 30 second quiz

Born in Vermont and built in Colorado, we are a grassroots, independent brand building goggles and helmets for dedicated skiers and snowboarders.

Our equipment comes ready to roll right out of the box with everything you need, and nothing you don't.

settings.subtitle: Why choose us?
settings.title: Explain your brand philosophy
settings.text: Use this section to explain your company philosophy or standards. Showcase lifestyle photography for added emphasis. This content will appear on all products.

settings.text: Sign up for our newsletter to keep up to date on new product launches and 10% off your first order.

settings.code:
Not sure which goggle is right for you?

Take our quiz!

settings.subtitle: LIMITED RELEASE
settings.title: The Prospect Sunglasses
settings.text: Classic yet highly technical sunglasses handmade in Italy. Built for skiers and snowboarders like you.

settings.title: CHECK US OUT ON YOUTUBE
settings.text: Follow the Glade team as we live, work, and ski in Breckenridge, Colorado.

settings.custom_box_paragraph: Don't just take our word for it: our gear has received glowing reviews from Outside Magazine, Ski Magazine, Blister Gear Review, Freeskier Magazine, Backcountry Magazine, Backpacker Magazine, and more.
The best gear on the market, at unbeatable prices. Our competitors are stuck with legacy manufacturing processes and outdated distribution models - we're not.
We live and breathe skiing from our headquarters in Breckenridge, Colorado. Check out our video series to follow along on local backcountry tours, resort pow days, and more.

settings.title: SUNGLASSES FOR MOUNTAIN LIVING
settings.subheading: Purpose built to take you from the trail, to the river, to the patio, and back again.

settings.testimonial: "Glade proves you don’t need to drop more than $200 to have a high-quality experience. I was so happy with its versatility."
"Best Overall Eyewear Award Winner: After a summer of hiking and biking around Colorado, they’re as unscratched as the day we got them."
"These glasses performed well in all areas and passed my many tests. After a month of wearing them, they’re still scratch free."

settings.text: Free shipping
